Description: Ostracon, fragment of the upper-body of a brown pottery ribbed vessel, the fabric is greyish in section, the interior is spotted with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a brown slip and very faint traces of a black-painted text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394304) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394304)
